game.name: Rayifox
game.description:
Some bad robots have captured a very cute and little electric fox and her family when she was resting at her home. The fox has really got puzzled and seeks for someone who could help her escape from the prison of robots. Are you ready to give your helping hands to someone who is in need? Join Rayifox now and help this electric fox to find the ways to bring her and her family back to home! The whole gameplay is full of fun and thrill so there is no chance of getting you bored. 

In this brand new adventure game, you will have to play the role of life saver for Rayifox and her family. The task is not as simple and easy as it seems. Pay attention to details, challenge your fingers and get ready to get participated in the most popular adventurous activity! Make sure to keep your eyes on the robots while changing one platform to another to spot the exit gate. You will lose the game immediately once you are caught by any of the deadly robots. 

With 40 different levels platform adventure, each level comes with unique and challenges. Apply your quick reaction and problem-solving skills to achieve the goal in this free online platform game! Bad robots and traps are looking at you, so all you need to be careful all the time. Run, jump and defeat the machines using the electric power! This cool HTML5 game can be played with the help of keyboard. Use right/left arrow to move, up to jump, B for Power 1 and N for Power 2. Check out top adventure games for boys by just browsing through our huge list of online games!

game.mobileControlKeys: L-R ICONS TO MOVE, RIGHT ICONS TO JUMP AND ENERGY
game.webControlKeys: UP ARROW TO JUMP, L-R ARROWS TO MOVE, B- USE ENERGY
